titles: An humble petition unto the high and most honourable Courts of Parliament, that they would be pleased to condiseend [sic] to the perusing of these short notes, tending to the refining of the Booke of Common-Prayer, in a few things. / By Theophilus Brabourn.
author: Brabourne, Theophilus, b. 1590.
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
keywords: Church of England. --  Book of common prayer. --  Psalter.
